forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 51. Southwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 66. West wind 3 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the city stirs gently beneath a mostly clear sky. With a calmness draped in a cool embrace, the temperature hovers around a refreshing 51 degrees, tenderly coaxing its early risers to embrace the crisp morning air. The whispers of a mild southwest breeze carry the scent of the bay, inviting a sense of serenity that inspires a quiet moment of reflection or perhaps a gentle stroll through the neighborhood.

By midday, the sun will assert its presence, promising a pleasant high of around 66 degrees. The day will unveil itself like a beautifully scripted play, with a westward wind stirring up to 18 miles per hour, adding a lively touch to the sunny backdrop. The clarity of the air invites the colors of the city to come alive, revealing vibrant details that may have whispered in the shadows of foggy past mornings. While today dances away from the challenges of heavy fog, the marine layer resides gently along the shoreline, hinting at the mysteries of the ocean just beyond the Golden Gate.

For those contemplating their attire, a light sweater or jacket will serve well against the lingering coolness of the morning while offering comfort as the day warms. The open skies beckon one to engage in activities that savor this fine weather—an afternoon coffee at a sidewalk café bustling with conversation, a leisurely bike ride along the Embarcadero, or a simple exploration of the vibrant murals that adorn the streets, each telling a part of the city’s story. As the sun climbs higher, let it illuminate not just the landscape but also the heart, nurturing a sense of wonder in this iconic, ever-inspiring urban tapestry.
